author: jwross
msg: ARIES-910: Integrates subsystems into the Aries build just before samples.

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-910: Fixed issue where tests that were dependent on jars built by the maven-jar-plugin would fail on the first run from a clean source checkout because the jars were produced after the files had been copied from the src/ directory to the target/ directory. I tried to play around with various phase settings but to no avail. I finally changed the <outputDirectory> setting to point directly to target/.
